[Apricot of Bestial Might](/Equipment.aspx?ID=947)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 74</row>

**Price** 2,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This yellow fruit's soft flesh is covered by waxy, fibrous leaves reminiscent of a pineapple. When you eat an apricot of bestial might, you transform into a boar-faced battle form with scaly skin. You can use feats with this item as if it were a [bestial mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=82), improving your tusk unarmed attack as if it were a claw or jaws attack.

 **Benefit** You gain 8 resistance to all physical damage and gain a tusk unarmed attack with the [deadly d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) trait that deals 1d10 piercing damage.

 **Drawback** You become [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3). If you perform an action with the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) or [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101) traits, you must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or the action is lost.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
